name: fabric-admin-lockout-exists-on-firmware-update

GET.summary:
Check if there exists a FortiGate in the Fabric that has an administrative user that will get locked out if firmware is updated to a version that does not support safer passwords. 
 Access Group: any

help: Check if there exists a FortiGate in the Fabric that has an administrative user that will get locked out if firmware is updated to a version that does not support safer passwords.

exists.name: exists
exists.title: Exists
exists.description: True if there is at least 1 admin that will get locked out if the device's firmware version gets updated to a version that does not support safer passwords.

response_title: Fabric Admin Lockout on Firmware Update
response_description: Result of checking whether a FortiGate in the Fabric has a administrative user that will get locked out if the device's firmware version gets updated to a version that does not support safer passwords.
